conclusion: Violation of Art. 14+P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 6-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 8;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF GAYGUSUZ v. AUSTRIA - [Russian Translation]
issue: Basic Law, Article 5 ; Federal Constitution, Articles 130 para. 1 and 144 paras. 1-3 ; Administrative Court Act, sections 34 (1), 41 (1), 42 (1) and (2), 63 (1) ; Unemployment Insurance Act, 1977, sections 1, 23, 33 and 34, Act amended in 1992, sections 33 (3) and (4), 34 (3) and (4)
scl: Inze v. Austria judgment of 28 October 1987, Series A no. 126, p. 18, para. 40;Darby v. Sweden judgment of 23 October 1990, Series A no. 187, p. 12, para. 30;Karlheinz Schmidt v. Germany judgment of 18 July 1994, Series A no. 291-B, p. 32, para. 22
